Test Case Summary: This is to send an email request to reset the forgotten password
Test Case Execution Steps:
1. Go to home page
2. Click on forgot password link
3. Provide email address
4. Click send reset request button
Test Case Expected Result: Must see a popup saying check email account for a reset password email

Test Case Summary: This is to check the subscription of pricing.
Test Case Execution Steps:
1. Go to home page
2. Scroll down and find search subscription.
3. Click on check pricing.
Test Case Expected Result: When we click on check pricing button it should show us the price of the subscription for rollingradius.
Remarks: Pricing structure needs to be changed

Functionality: Sign up with using a new account
Test Case Summary: This is to check if we are able to register with new email id or phone numbers
Test Case Execution Steps:
1. Click on "User" drop down.
2. Click on register.
Test Case Expected Result: When we click on register it was asking to enter the mobile number and enter the OTP then we can add our basic details like email, name, company name and create password.

Functionality: Login to the website as a customer.
Sub Functionality: Login and work inside the site as per the requirement of the user.
Test Case Summary: This is to check if we are able to login to the website.
Test Case Execution Steps:
1. Click on "User" drop down.
2. Click on login.
Test Case Expected Result: When we click on login it gives us a window to enter our phone number and password and once we put all required information then we will be able to login

Test Case Summary: This is to check if forgot password link is working.
Test Case Execution Steps:
1. Click on "User" drop down.
2. Click on forgot password.
Test Case Expected Result: When we click on forgot password, It redirect us to the page to enter the phone number and get OTP and once we put the OTP it allows us to change the password.

Sub Functionality: So that customer can see the reports
Test Case Summary: This is to check if report button is working.
Test Case Execution Steps: Click to the report button at the top right next to the customer name.
Test Case Expected Result: When we click on the Report Button, It shows us "Load Request, User interaction, Pick up parcel, Drop Parcel, User payment & User paid fee".
